titles.title: The Lord Thy God In The Midst

properties.copyright: 1972 Scripture In Song, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
The Lord, thy God in the midst of thee
Is mighty, is mighty.
He will save, He will rejoice over thee
With joy, with joy.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
He will rest in His love,
He will joy over thee with singing.
The Lord, thy God in the midst of thee
Is mighty, is mighty, is mighty.
